page.title: 062 FARMS:NATEBY & MALLERSTANG
page.content: DALEFOOT,MALLERSTANG AND THRINGILL, NATEBY, ARE UPLAND FARMS, THE FORMER HAVING 90 ACRES OF ENCLOSED LAND AND THE LATTER 220 ACRES.BOTH OWN ADDIT- IONAL GRASSLAND OUTSIDE THE AREA,HAVE FULL GRAZING RIGHTS AND ARE OWNER- OCCUPIED.DALEFOOT IS FARMED BY A BRO- THER AND SISTER AND THRINGILL BY HUS- BAND, WIFE AND SON. ABOUT 1 QUARTER OF EACH FARM IS MEADOWLAND.DALEFOOT MAKING HAY AND SILAGE AND THRINGILL ALL HAY.THE ENTERPRISES ARE PURELY BEEF,SHEEP.AT DALEFOOT ADDITIONAL CALVES ARE BOUGHT FOR DUAL SUCKLING 25 COWS,WHEREAS THRINGILL CARRIES 52 SINGLE SUCKLED COWS.LIMOUSIN BULLS ARE USED.THE CALVES ARE SOLD AS STORES, EITHER AT KIRKBY STEPHEN IN OCTOBER OR AT CARLISLE OR APPLEBY IN THE FOLLOW- ING SPRING. DALEFOOT HAS 300 SWALEDALE EWES AND THRINGILL 550.ABOUT HALF THE (CONTINUED ON PAGE 7)
